title: snowflake.snowpark.DataFrameStatFunctions.sampleBy | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Returns a DataFrame containing a stratified sample without replacement, based on a dict that specifies the fraction for each stratum.
col – The name of the column that defines the strata.

fractions – A dict that specifies the fraction to use for the sample for each stratum.
If a stratum is not specified in the dict, the method uses 0 as the fraction.
